fields.name: id
fields.title: Creator identifier
fields.description: unique identifier for creator

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: full name; may include variant names; for more, see https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu/about/faq/#names

fields.name: sort_name
fields.title: Sort name
fields.description: authorized name

fields.name: gender
fields.title: Gender
fields.description: male, female, nonbinary, unknown; for more, see https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu/about/faq/#gender

fields.name: is_organization
fields.title: Is an organization?
fields.description: creator is an organization instead of a person (boolean)

fields.name: birth_year
fields.title: Birth year
fields.description: birth year, if known

fields.name: death_year
fields.title: Death year
fields.description: death year, if known

fields.name: viaf_url
fields.title: VIAF url
fields.description: URL for Virtual Internet Authority File (VIAF, https://viaf.org/) identifier, if available

fields.name: wikipedia_url
fields.title: Wikipedia url
fields.description: URL for Wikipedia page, if available

fields.name: nationalities
fields.title: Nationalities
fields.description: countries for known nationality (if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: member_uri
fields.title: Member URI
fields.description: identifier; member detail page on https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu

fields.name: notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: more information (text with markdown formatting)

fields.name: updated
fields.title: Date updated
fields.description: timestamp record was last modified in the Shakespeare and Company Project database before export

fields.name: id
fields.title: Book identifier
fields.description: unique identifier for book

fields.name: uri
fields.title: Book URI
fields.description: full URI for book; book detail page on https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu

fields.name: title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: title of the book or other item

fields.name: author
fields.title: Author
fields.description: author or authors, last name first (multiple, separated by semicolon)

fields.name: editor
fields.title: Editor(s)
fields.description: editor(s) of work

fields.name: translator
fields.title: Translator(s)
fields.description: translator(s) of work

fields.name: introduction
fields.title: Author of introduction
fields.description: author of an introduction to work

fields.name: illustrator
fields.description: illustrator(s) of work
fields.title: Illustrator(s)

fields.name: photographer
fields.title: Photographer(s)
fields.description: photographer(s) featured in work

fields.name: year
fields.description: year published
fields.title: Publication year

fields.name: format
fields.title: Format
fields.description: type of item (article, book, periodical, phonograph record, photograph, print)

fields.name: genre_category
fields.title: Genre
fields.description: genre of work (drama, fiction, nonfiction, periodical, poetry; if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: uncertain
fields.title: Item is uncertain?
fields.description: boolean indicating if item is ambiguous or unidentifiable

fields.name: ebook_url
fields.title: Ebook URL
fields.description: link to a digital edition of this work

fields.name: volumes_issues
fields.title: Volume/Issue numbers
fields.description: list of multivolume volumes or periodical issues known to have circulated (separated by semicolon)

fields.name: notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: more information, e.g. about uncertain titles (text with markdown formatting)

fields.name: event_count
fields.title: Associated events count
fields.description: total number of events associated with this title (integer)

fields.name: borrow_count
fields.title: Borrow count
fields.description: total number of borrowing events associated with this title (integer)

fields.name: purchase_count
fields.title: Purchase count
fields.description: total number of purchase events associated with this title (integer)

fields.name: circulation_years
fields.title: Circulation years
fields.description: list of years of known activity for this title (if multiple, separated by semicolon)

fields.name: updated
fields.title: Date updated
fields.description: timestamp record was last modified in the Shakespeare and Company Project database before export

fields.name: event_type
fields.title: Event type
fields.description: type of event

fields.name: start_date
fields.title: Start date
fields.description: start date, if known (ISO 8601 format; YYYY, YY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, or --MM-DD)

fields.name: end_date
fields.title: End date
fields.description: end date, if known (ISO 8601 format; YYYY, YY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, or --MM-DD)

fields.name: member_ids
fields.title: Member indentifier
fields.description: unique identifier for members associated with this event (if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: member_uris
fields.title: Member URI
fields.description: list of URIs for members associated with this event (if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: member_names
fields.title: Member name
fields.description: list of full member names with variants (if multiple, separated by semicolons; order matches member_uris)

fields.name: member_sort_names
fields.title: Member sort name
fields.description: list of member authorized sort names (if multiple, separated by semicolons; order matches member_uris)

fields.name: subscription_price_paid
fields.title: Subscription price paid
fields.description: amount paid for a subscription event (numeric)

fields.name: subscription_deposit
fields.title: Subscription deposit
fields.description: amount deposited for a new subscription (numeric)

fields.name: subscription_duration
fields.title: Subscription duration
fields.description: logical subscription duration (human readable, e.g. 6 months, 1 year)

fields.name: subscription_duration_days
fields.title: Subscription duration in days
fields.description: actual subscription duration in days (integer)

fields.name: subscription_volumes
fields.title: Number of subscription volumes
fields.description: number of volumes paid for in the subscription

fields.name: subscription_category
fields.title: Subscription categogry
fields.description: subscription plan, if any; see https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu/about/faq/#lending-library-plans

fields.name: subscription_purchase_date
fields.title: Subscription purchase date
fields.description: date the subscription was purchased (ISO 8601 format; YYYY, YYYY-MM, YYYY-MM-DD, or --MM-DD)

fields.name: reimbursement_refund
fields.title: Reimbursement refund
fields.description: amount refunded for a reimbursement event (numeric)

fields.name: borrow_status
fields.title: Borrow status
fields.description: status code indicating how a borrowing event ended (returned, bought, missing, unknown)

fields.name: borrow_duration_days
fields.title: Borrow duration in days
fields.description: borrow duration in days, if known (integer)

fields.name: purchase_price
fields.title: Purchase price
fields.description: amount paid for a purchase

fields.name: currency
fields.title: Type of currency
fields.description: currency code indicating currency of subscription price paid, deposit, reimbursement refund, or purchase price (ISO 4217 currency code)

fields.name: item_uri
fields.title: Item URI
fields.description: identifier for book associated with this event, if there is one

fields.name: item_title
fields.title: Item title
fields.description: title of the book associated with this event

fields.name: item_volume
fields.title: Item volume
fields.description: volume / issue of this work for this event, if item is a multivolume work or periodical and volume/issue information is known

fields.name: item_authors
fields.title: Item author(s)
fields.description: list of authors for this work; authorized names, last name first (if multiple, separated by semicolon)

fields.name: item_year
fields.title: Item year
fields.description: publication year

fields.name: item_notes
fields.title: Item notes
fields.description: notes about the item

fields.name: source_type
fields.title: Source type
fields.description: type of source this data was drawn from (could be multiple; separated by semicolons)

fields.name: source_citation
fields.title: Source citation
fields.description: bibliographic citation for the source of this data

fields.name: source_manifest
fields.title: Source manifest
fields.description: IIIF Presentation manifest URL for a digitized edition of the source of this data (if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: source_image
fields.title: Source image
fields.description: IIIF Image URL for the digitized image in the IIIF manifest documenting this event, if known (if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: member_ids
fields.title: Member identifier
fields.description: unique identifier for member; member detail page on https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu

fields.name: member_names
fields.title: Member name
fields.description: full name of member; may include variant names; for more, see https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu/about/faq/#names

fields.name: member_sort_names
fields.title: Sort name
fields.description: authorized name

fields.name: member_uris
fields.title: Member URI
fields.description: full URI for member; member detail page on https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu

fields.name: care_of_person_id
fields.title: Care of person identifier
fields.description: identifier of person who relays correspondance to intended recipient

fields.name: care_of_person_name
fields.title: Care of person name
fields.description: name of person who relays correspondance to intended recipient

fields.name: location_name
fields.description: location name
fields.title: Location name

fields.name: street_address
fields.title: Street address
fields.description: address (house number and street name)

fields.name: postal_code
fields.title: Postal code
fields.description: postal code associated with address

fields.name: city
fields.title: City
fields.description: city associated with address

fields.name: arrondissement
fields.title: Arrondissement
fields.description: Paris arrondissements for addresses in Paris (integer)

fields.name: country
fields.title: Country
fields.description: country associated with address

fields.name: longitude
fields.title: Longitude
fields.description: longitudinal coordinate of address (numeric)

fields.name: latitude
fields.title: Latitude
fields.description: latitudinal coordinate of address (numeric)

fields.name: id
fields.title: Member identifier
fields.description: unique identifier for member

fields.name: uri
fields.title: Member URI
fields.description: full URI for member; member detail page on https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu

fields.name: name
fields.title: Name
fields.description: full name; may include variant names, name as written on lending library card; for more, see https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu/about/faq/#names

fields.name: sort_name
fields.title: Sort name
fields.description: authorized name

fields.name: title
fields.title: Title
fields.description: honorific address if known, e.g. Mr., Mrs. etc.

fields.name: gender
fields.title: Gender
fields.description: male, female, nonbinary, unknown; for more, see https://shakespeareandco.princeton.edu/about/faq/#gender

fields.name: is_organization
fields.title: Is an organization?
fields.description: member is an organization instead of a person (boolean)

fields.name: has_card
fields.title: Has a member card?
fields.description: member has an extant lending library card (boolean)

fields.name: birth_year
fields.title: Birth year
fields.description: birth year, if known

fields.name: death_year
fields.title: Death year
fields.description: death year, if known

fields.name: membership_years
fields.title: Years of membership
fields.description: list of known active membership years (multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: viaf_url
fields.title: VIAF URL
fields.description: URL for Virtual Internet Authority File (VIAF, https://viaf.org/) identifier, if available

fields.name: wikipedia_url
fields.title: Wikipedia URL
fields.description: URL for Wikipedia page, if available

fields.name: nationalities
fields.title: Nationalities
fields.description: countries for known nationality (if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: addresses
fields.title: Address(es)
fields.description: list of known addresses (if multiple, separated by semicolons)

fields.name: postal_codes
fields.title: Postal code(s)
fields.description: list of postal addresses from addresses (if multiple, separated by semicolons; order matches addresses)

fields.name: arrondissements
fields.title: Arrondissement(s)
fields.description: list of Paris arrondissements (integer; if multiple, separated by semicolons; order matches addresses)

fields.name: coordinates
fields.title: Coordinates
fields.description: list of geographical coordinates for known addresses (pairs of latitude, longitude; if multiple, separated by semicolons; order matches addresses)

fields.name: notes
fields.title: Notes
fields.description: more information (text with markdown formatting)

fields.name: updated
fields.title: Date updated
fields.description: timestamp record was last modified in the Shakespeare and Company Project database before export
